name: Battle Of Worldviews
description: Battle Of Worldviews - "real time strategy" in which you have to fight with friends or AI, while watching the resources, weather conditions and their development.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce 780 or better, AMD Radeon RX 580 or better DirectX: Version 11
